thread.title: Why Katrina Kaif Finds It Difficult To Work With Salman Khan & Ranbir Kapoor?
thread.title_full: Why Katrina Kaif Finds It Difficult To Work With Salman Khan & Ranbir Kapoor?

title: Why Katrina Kaif Finds It Difficult To Work With Salman Khan & Ranbir Kapoor?
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
Strange, right? Katrina herself revealed the fact that she finds it difficult to work with people who she knows very well and as we all know Katrina is very close to both, Salman Khan and Ranbir Kapoor ."I feel it is difficult to work with people you know very well. I think it is easier to act in front of strangers. When someone knows you really well and you are acting in front of them... you feel a bit forced, you feel you are acting... as he knows you are lying," Katrina told PTI. 
Katrina and Ranbir have earlier worked together in Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani and Rajneeti , but it is for the first time she is working with Anurag Basu , director of Jagga Jasoos .Not so long ago, there were reports that Anurag had a row with Katrina in front of the whole unit of the film and all was not well between them.On the same the Jagga Jasoos actress cleared the air by saying, "This is a stupid rumour. People are assuming problems because the film is not following our desired schedule. Ranbir who had worked with dada, knows the way he works and so do I."Meanwhile, check out the 'On the sets' pictures of Katrina Kaif with Salman Khan & Ranbir Kapoor.
